With dialed down sprays I really think this could work in any season or occasion except a hot summer day outside, but really shines at night.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1866777"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1866777#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1855995" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1855995" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GabrielleeeeeW"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1297965"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1297965.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GabrielleeeeeW" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Snif/Honey-Suite-99503.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.99503.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Honey Suite"title="Honey Suite"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1855995ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1855995" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1297965">GabrielleeeeeW</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-14">06/14/23 06:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is very masculine to my nose and I'm a lover of unisex frags (and have a few male marketed frags I enjoy wearing). Too masc for me. It is gourmand-ish but I don't get banana bread, just the caramel and coffee with a woody and patch base. It is like nothing I have ever sampled before and it's definitely niche quality. I'm still not sure how I feel about it exactly though, I like it but don't think I want to smell like this. Performance has been good, it lasts several hours for me and seems to project pretty strong.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1855995"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1855995#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1854629" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1854629" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AnnaMaria0307"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1699459"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1699459.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AnnaMaria0307" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/BDK-Parfums/Pas-Ce-Soir-Extrait-83663.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83663.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pas Ce Soir Extrait"title="Pas Ce Soir Extrait"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1854629ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1854629" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1699459">AnnaMaria0307</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-12">06/12/23 08:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my favorites from Bond. I get a mix of men's cologne with banana bread. So unique! Definitely unisex (the banana bread smell softens and sweetens it), but overall leans a tad masculine. Always have it in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1854629"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1854629#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1852522" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1852522" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jhodder"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1611635"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1611635.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jhodder" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Gentleman-Eau-de-Parfum-Reserve-Privee-71272.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71272.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentleman Eau de Parfum Reserve Prive"title="Gentleman Eau de Parfum Reserve Prive"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1852522ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1852522" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1611635">jhodder</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-09">06/09/23 05:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the first Bond No. 9 fragrance that I have bought, despite living very close to their West Village boutique, and I must say that I am super disappointed.  Nothing special.  All the notes that others point out are there, but nothing really stands out.  "Caramel"?  Yeah, I guess. "Sandalwood"?  Hmm, its there a little bit.  "White florals" are really all that I can pick up.  They crowd out everything else. Really is unmemorable as compared to most niche and many designer alternatives. Way overpriced. For what I paid and for all the hype, I expected something more unique.  Performance is also pretty week.  Disappeared into a skin scent in an hour.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1852522"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1852522#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1837746" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1837746" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tokyosake"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1376336"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1376336.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tokyosake" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/BDK-Parfums/Velvet-Tonka-68119.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68119.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Velvet Tonka"title="Velvet Tonka"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1837746ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1837746" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1376336">tokyosake</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-20">05/20/23 10:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Soapy caramel. Thats it. Never thought I would describe a fragrance that way. Lasted on the skin for over 5 hours before I had a shower. I can definitely see why its popular but also why others may find it boring &amp; overpriced. I feel like its supposed to be a crowd pleaser - not a niche lovers one-in-a-million.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1837746"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1837746#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1808056" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1808056" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="saffron spice"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1383825"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="saffron spice" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kyse-Perfumes/Delizia-di-Marshmallow-56189.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56189.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Delizia di Marshmallow"title="Delizia di Marshmallow"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1808056ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1808056" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1383825">saffron spice</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-13">04/13/23 15:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So sweet like candy I have nothing bad to say about this one. I need it!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1808056"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1808056#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1794794" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1794794" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dantek121"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580375"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1580375.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dantek121" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1794794ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1794794" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580375">dantek121</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-28">03/28/23 10:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I saw glowing reviews from many fragrance reviewers about this bottle and went ahead to purchase. The dominant notes to me are banana (not listed) and Bond No. 9's interpretation of caramel, which I am familiar with from their other fragrances such as Bleecker st. It is definitely a gourmand. It is also a very sweet scent and while unisex, leans feminine. Projection is decent but not strong; it becomes a skin scent fairly quickly. As a skin scent, this lasts upwards of 12 hours on me. At discounted prices I would say this is worth it because it is unique and interesting but it is not one of the best fragrances Bond no.9 has to offer. I would place NoMad, Lafayette st. and a few others above it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1794794"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1794794#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1783017" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1783017" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DustyMemphis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1228928"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1228928.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DustyMemphis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Chameau/Arabia-Al-Oud-83586.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83586.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Arabia Al Oud"title="Arabia Al Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1783017ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1783017" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1228928">DustyMemphis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-14">03/14/23 03:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The price is beyond ridiculous!!!<br />
<br />
While it does smell nice, it's not worth the money at all, and i came pretty close on making a cheap version of it, because it is just sweet madness...<br />
<br />
Buy if you don't already have the following:<br />
<br />
1 cheap bottle of Vodka<br />
1 can of Coca Cola<br />
2 Snickers<br />
3 - 5 drops Sandalwood Essential Oil<br />
1/2 teaspoon Instant Coffee<br />
<br />
In a pot, add 8,5 oz (250 ml) of Coca Cola, and the 2 Snickers, Instant Coffee, heat it up to melt, not boiling, this can be done in the microwave as well... <br />
<br />
Set aside and cool down<br />
<br />
Once cooled down, mix it with equal parts Vodka, the Sandalwood Essential Oil, and let it sit 2 - 4 weeks in a chill dark place like a cabinet<br />
<br />
To use: Dap a cotton pad in the mixture, and just dap a little on the base of the neckline and where ever you usually put it, and let it sit for a minute to dry, then take a piece of wet kitchen towel or a wet cotton pad, and wipe it off, as it will most likely feel a little sticky from all the Sugar and it might color your clothes!<br />
<br />
Less than 20$<br />
<br />
You're welcome ;)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1783017"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1783017#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1782844" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1782844" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aaronmy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1530551"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="aaronmy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Day-Three/Escandalo-94878.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.94878.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Escndalo"title="Escndalo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1782844ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1782844" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1530551">aaronmy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-13">03/13/23 19:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is such a lovely and sexy scent. It's very interesting and warm. It's not overly sweet and it's not overbearing. The scent trail is quite nice and the transition from opening to the base is unique. In the mid, it has this aquatic, and warm sweetness, with a subtle coffee darkness. I know this would be sexy on the female side. It doesn't perform too well unfortunately so I'm not sure how worth it this would be, but I still believe this is a great scent profile.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1782844"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1782844#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1775932" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1775932" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Frafleur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1177754"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Frafleur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1775932ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1775932" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1177754">Frafleur</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-05">03/05/23 19:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Coca-Cola has a limited edition soda (spring 2023) called "Move." It's described as being 'transformational flavored' lol. I was intrigued to say the least, but it was hands down the most unpleasant cola I had ever tasted. I kept thinking that it tasted like coconut, caramel and a dash of aftershave. <br />
<br />
I kept drinking it and decided that it tasted like a cologne. I came home and rummaged through my scents and samples, but still couldn't place the scent/flavor.  Then it hit me. I had to dig deep to find my Bond samples but I knew which one I was looking for.<br />
<br />
New York Nights smells exactly like that cola tastes! A very sweet, semi-tropical fragrance better suited for spritzing on your throat and not going down your throat in a wash of fizzy bubbles.<br />
<br />
I set out to see what other people were saying about the flavor to determine if maybe I was just imagining things. And while no one matched it to NYN, one review described it as such:  "Theres also an unpleasant fragrance here, onethat I cantaste. Thats right, Im tasting a smell here. It has aperfume quality,like a candle melted down andmixed with Coca-Cola".<br />
<br />
See? I'm not going cuckoo. <br />
<br />
Long story short, if you want to get an idea of what this fragrance is like, try Coca-Cola Move and focus on the aftertaste.  That's New York Nights in drinkable form.<br />
<br />
Bottoms up!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1775932"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1775932#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1766986" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1688046">Jaben4Real</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-22">02/22/23 22:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This stuff is amazing. Gentleman, do not hesitate on this one. Absolute caramel and toffee bomb thats not overpowering. More masculine to me but definitely not so much that a woman wouldnt smell amazing in this as well. Great fall scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1766986"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1766986#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1766726" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1766726" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JamesGamez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1521295"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1521295.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JamesGamez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1766726ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1766726" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1521295">JamesGamez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-22">02/22/23 15:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is so gooood. Smells like banana bread with a slight black coffee scent. You can pick up on the sea notes but it blends in well. This is so good that I bought the matching body silk. <br />
The longevity is really good on this, but Ive noticed the projection seems to be slightly below moderate.  But idc, thats how good this smells.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1766726"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1766726#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1761467" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1761467" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="katierose4260"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1044600"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1044600.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="katierose4260" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Beyonce/Heat-7745.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7745.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Heat"title="Heat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1761467ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1761467" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1044600">katierose4260</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-16">02/16/23 07:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like a sexy banana split. Take that as you will. Perfectly unisex and turns heads. Also, the bottle is stunning, but it is Bond No.9, so I should be surprised. I layer this with the Sugared Banana Hempz lotion!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1761467"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1761467#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1753642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1753642" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ONETOTHETHREE"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1405117"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ONETOTHETHREE" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1753642ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1753642" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1405117">ONETOTHETHREE</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-06">02/06/23 16:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Looking to buy a 50mL or 100mL bottle!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1753642"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1753642#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1752897" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1752897" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AkaNeri"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1524122"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1524122.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AkaNeri" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1752897ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1752897" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1524122">AkaNeri</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-05">02/05/23 16:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Imagine very ripe bananas... Like very ripe... with a lot of dark spots on the skin. Then you take those bananas, and pour on top of them hot thick caramel! You got New York Nights! Beautiful scent, at the opening even too sweet, but it has a beautiful dry down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1752897"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1752897#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1731045" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1731045" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Suicidal_wizard"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1610786"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Suicidal_wizard" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1731045ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1731045" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);
