padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1253458">FemmeArgent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-28">09/28/20 16:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Was hesitant to try this sample because, based on the notes, it didn't sound like something I'd like on myself. After listening to some You Tube reviews, I decided to give it a try. Every time I got a whiff, I thought of Idris Elba. This is what I imagine him smelling like. Not even with the aid of a parfum but just his natural scent. Smelled chocolatey to me. Delicious, fresh, clean...absolutely YUMMY!!! I just wanted to take a doggone bite to see if it tasted as good and gourmand as it smells! It's not the most feminine scent but I can see a woman wearing it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1230195"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1230195#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1214372" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1214372" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="StillJuliaGayle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1225498"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1225498.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="StillJuliaGayle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clinique/Blue-Sky-Neroli-53722.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53722.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blue Sky Neroli"title="Blue Sky Neroli"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1214372ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1214372" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1225498">StillJuliaGayle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-21">08/21/20 11:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am shopping for a new fall fragrance and I wanted give Bond No 9 another try-some of their scents can be hit or miss. So far, I am pleased. It is like a cross between Good Girl and Kenzo Jungle L'Elephant. I love the smokey sweetness just like L'Elephant and the gourmand notes are in keeping with Good Girls-esp the coffee-loooove that when it is mingled with the patchouli (very clean) and the carnation. A fun, romantic and sensuous scent.<br />
It reminds me of of a late night stroll along the river after a night of dining, theater and dancing. A quick coffee in the hand for the drive home while a crisp wind from the river tussles your hair.<br />
Thankfully, due to my body chemistry the silage is very long, no need to reapply.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1214372"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1214372#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1202379" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/773746">Chicago Tony T</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-21">07/21/20 20:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very soft gourmand with light florals and caramel,light coffee with a touch of woodiness. Sillage and projection are not great but this one is so non cloying that it can be worn in extreme heat and would not be offensive.80/20 feminine. I don't see many guys wearing this as after 1 wearing I am selling my decant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1202379"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1202379#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1193895" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1193895" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Christine802"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1244688"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1244688.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Christine802" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lalique/Lalique-Le-Parfum-1840.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1840.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lalique Le Parfum"title="Lalique Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1193895ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1193895" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1244688">Christine802</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-06-28">06/28/20 18:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is such a fun, whimsical scent. Immediately it reminded me of those mini banana hard candies, elevated by a myriad of warm and comforting other elements. It doesn't develop much on the skin which is fine because it's so great already. My boyfriend has been telling me all day that I smell so good. The price tag is hard to stomach so I'll probably keep buying travel spray sizes (I own so many perfumes it takes me a long time to use up even a bottle of that size). This is definitely in my top 5 perfumes that I own.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1193895"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1193895#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="46057" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>

</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1489260" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1489260" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Qortni"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1338106"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1338106.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Qortni" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/24-rue-de-l-Universite-47671.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47671.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="24 rue de l'Universit"title="24 rue de l'Universit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1489260ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1489260" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1338106">Qortni</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-23">01/23/22 09:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Picture this, if you will: <br />
<br />
A home is filled with the smell of banana nut bread, made earlier in the day - now cooled down into a dense and moist treat.  Coffee's brewing.  The window is open, and clean tropical air is carrying in flowers from the garden.  Rain is coming.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1489260"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1489260#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1336251" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1336251" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Joseebus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1334273"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1334273.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Joseebus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Tobacco-Honey-84518.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84518.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Honey"title="Tobacco Honey"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1336251ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1336251" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1334273">Joseebus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-02">05/02/21 15:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Frustrating, because this is truly a delicious, unique scent. Caramel, gourmand explosion before settling into a beautiful, somewhat powdery, Juicy Fruit gum-like dream (I swear to me it smells kinda like Juicy Fruit gum!). The problem is that it lasts MAYBE 2-3 hours on my skin with projection for maybe the first 30 minutes. For 400 bucks a bottle, I better be leaving a trail down the street for at least half the day! A shame. If it lasted longer and projected better this would definitely be a signature fragrance contender.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1336251"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1336251#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1359053" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1359053" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LateBloomer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1164542"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1164542.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LateBloomer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memo-Paris/Tamarindo-48286.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48286.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tamarindo"title="Tamarindo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1359053ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1359053" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1164542">LateBloomer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-12">06/12/21 20:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Caramel, coffee, chocolate, banana...I tried describing it to my friend and I said it sounds horrible but it is AMAZING. It's the banana that just slays me - not a scent I have ever considered or wanted in a perfume, but it is what makes this one special. Lasts for 9 or 10 hours on me and projection is good - not too strong - but people around me notice it. I wear it at night in hot and humid weather and it shimmers in the heat. My favorite Bond.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1359053"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1359053#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2106157" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2106157" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="seliminit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1894669"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="seliminit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2106157ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2106157" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1894669">seliminit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-27">03/27/24 14:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>IS THIS THE FANUM COLOGNE?!?!?!?!?!??!?!??!?!??!?!?!?!??!*: .. o()o ..:*</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="2106157"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=2106157#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent877288" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc877288" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KaelanLovesPerfume"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/238964"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.238964.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KaelanLovesPerfume" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Cruz-del-Sur-II-46098.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46098.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cruz del Sur II"title="Cruz del Sur II"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma877288ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd877288" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/238964">KaelanLovesPerfume</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-11-04">11/04/17 17:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I put this on and couldn't stop smelling my wrists all day. Very gourmand, as I was wearing I was trying to pick out specific notes but to no avail. Nothing really stands out except for the fact that it's gourmand. I'm surprised to see florals and especially sea notes as the most upvoted notes when that's not what I smell at all. <br />
<br />
The coffee and caramel are at the forefront and leading this fragrance, I suppose the florals are there but only to lend support and to provide depth and balance to the sweet caramel and the rich coffee. <br />
<br />
Don't be mislead by the sea notes, if they're there at all then like the florals, they're giving the coffee and caramel a helping hand straight to the front. Fragrance stays basically the same throughout, not much evolution but that's okay because what we get initially is more than enough. <br />
<br />
One more thing to add, the fragrance isn't candy sweet like caramel would imply, the coffee cuts a lot of that sweetness and we're left with an extremely rich, creamy, slightly sweet aura of what the caramel used to be. Definitely still sweet, but the coffee perfectly prevents it from smelling of candy and from being too feminine. Definitely going to purchase this.<br />
<br />
**UPDATE** - So here it is, months later after leaving this review. I ended up buying this fragrance and am extremely disappointed. Not in the smell, I still stand by everything that I wrote above. It's a beautiful and amazing aroma that I would be satisfied either wearing this out to a fancy evening event, or just spraying it on my bed sheets on a lazy day. It's just one of those type of fragrances. It works for anything or any occasion. Beautiful beautiful scent. So.. why am I disappointed? Because I paid over $400 bucks for it and it lasts no longer than 20 minutes on my skin. No exaggeration. 20 minutes. Most bath &amp; body works body sprays last longer than this cologne. It's absolutely ridiculous. I will no longer buy or support Bond no. 9. It's ridiculous that they expect people to pay them their hard earned money for a couple ounces of basically water. A money hungry, greedy corporation that doesn't care about their customers or any problem that they may experience. I will use up this body spray until it's done, but after that I will never purchase nor support anything that Bond no. 9 ever releases again. Horrible company.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="877288"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=877288#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="46057" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1401445" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LisaandtheWord"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/25188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.25188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LisaandtheWord" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Rocher/Voile-d-Ambre-1981.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1981.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Voile d'Ambre"title="Voile d'Ambre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1401445ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1401445" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/25188">LisaandtheWord</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-30">08/30/21 13:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was excited to try this because I usually like the notes used here.. but I find there's a slight b.o./dusty funk flavor in the background. To my nose the combo of marine note, sandalwood, gardenia, coffee and caramel are not adding up to a good outcome.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1401445"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1401445#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1669835" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1669835" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="liebe_anne"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504903"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1504903.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="liebe_anne" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1669835ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1669835" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504903">liebe_anne</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-19">10/19/22 17:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I read the reviews after purchasing it and on the opening, I dont get the banana smell but rather it smells like nail polish or walking into a nail salon. Am I the only one getting this?? I do smell the coffee in the dry down though but its still very sweet and Im not sure if thats the sandalwood or the patchouli Im getting. Theres a little bit of caramel too but its too light to make this a gourmand fragrance for me. Not worth the price tag for me sadly and Im unsure if Ill keep this bottle in my collection but for now Ill keep testing it out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46057"comment_id="1669835"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Nights-46057.html?ccid=1669835#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="46057" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="search-reviews"><search-perfume-reviews :perfume_id="46057":random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]"></search-perfume-reviews></div></div><foundation-tabs></foundation-tabs></reviews-wrapper></div><perfume-shortcut-menu :perfume_id="46057" when-hidden="#toptop"></perfume-shortcut-menu><initialize-status-data></initialize-status-data><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_footer -->

        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">1.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Khamrah-75805.html" class="en2inter">Khamrah Lattafa Perfumes</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">2.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Elixir-81642.html" class="en2inter">Le Male Elixir Jean Paul Gaultier</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">3.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/By-Kilian/Angels-Share-62615.html" class="en2inter">Angels&#039; Share By Kilian</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">4.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

        </span>
    </div>
            </div>
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">5.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Xerjoff/XJ-1861-Naxos-30529.html" class="en2inter">XJ 1861 Naxos Xerjoff</a>
        </span>

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });

</script>
